name: Waterdeep
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Waterdeep.

name: Menzoberranzan
text: Can be played at any time. Immune to flyers.

name: Ruins of Zhentil Keep
text: Can defend itself as a level 5 monster, and can only be attacked by clerics.

name: Shadowdale
text: Any champion can cast cleric and wizard spells when defending Shadowdale.

name: Cormyr
text: Can cast any wizard spell.

name: Sembia
text: Attacking players must discard a card from their hand or pool for each champion sent forward.

name: Moonshae Isles
text: The Moonshaes can defend themselves as a level 2 hero. All defending allies gain 3 levels.

name: Thay
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Thay.

name: Calimshan
text: Defending champions gain +1 for each magical item they own.

name: Pirate Isles
text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

name: Ravens Bluff
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Ravens Bluff.

name: The Great Rift
text: Flyers cannot attack this realm.

name: Myth Drannor
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Myth Drannor. Increases player's maximum hand by one.

name: Vaasa
text: Vaasa is populated by fierce roving bands of monsters and barbarians. Heroes of base level 3 or less cannot attack it.

name: Jungles of Chult
text: Chult can defend itself as a level 5 monster.

name: The High Forest
text: Defenders of the High Forest are immune to offensive magical items.

name: Sword Coast
text: The defending player can return one ally to his hand after each round of battle.

name: Anauroch
text: All attackers lose one level.

name: Impiltur
text: All champions and allies who defend Impiltur gain 1 level.

name: Icewind Dale
text: The attacking champion must discard one magical item chosen by the defender.

name: The High Moor
text: Any defending monster gains 4 levels.

name: Rashemen
text: Red Wizard champions may not attack Rashemen. All other wizards lose 2 levels when attacking.

name: Damara
text: Double the level of a defending Forgotten Realms champion.

name: Narfell
text: The riders of Narfell add 3 levels to all defending champions and allies.

name: Dragonspear Castle
text: All allies of a defending monster gain 2 levels.

name: Daggerdale
text: Allies cannot be used when attacking this realm.

name: Darkhold
text: All defenders of Darkhold gain 3 levels if the Ruins of Zhentil Keep is in play anywhere.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/421.

name: Evermeet
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending Evermeet. Flyers, swimmers, and earthwalkers cannot attack it.

name: The Trollmoors
text: The Trollmoors regenerate and must be defeated twice in one turn before being razed.

name: Berdusk
text: A wizard or cleric gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

name: Tantras
text: No spells can be cast when attacking or defending Tantras.

name: Mulmaster
text: Draw another card every time a spell card is played.

name: Hillsfar
text: Any champion gains 3 levels when defending the attached realm.

name: Suzail
text: Any champion can cast wizard spells when defending the attached realm. If attached to Cormyr, all defenders also gain 4 levels.

name: Arabel
text: The attached realm can defend itself as a level 4 monster.

name: Castle Draw
text: The foul air of Castle Draw causes each attacking champion to become ill. All champions, even if victorious, are discarded.

name: Fortifications
text: Each defender of the attached realm gains 3 levels.

name: Selune
text: Undead cannot attack the attached realm.

name: Peasant Militia
text: Each champion and ally attacking the attached realm loses 1 level.

name: Alias the Sell-Sword
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: King Azoun IV
text: All allies of King Azoun IV gain 1 level.

name: Maligor the Red
text: Once per battle Maligor can shift one opposing ally to his own side.

name: Elminster the Mage
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: Drizzt Do' Urden
text: Elf (drow). When defending, Drizzt must be defeated twice in one battle before he is discarded.

name: Midnight, Goddess of Magic
text: If only one Midnight is in play, wizards cannot cast spells without her permission. She also destroys all magical items held by the opposing champion.

name: Torg Mac Cei, the Ironlord
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Torg's level is doubled when defending or attacking the Great Rift.

name: The Pereghost
text: All the pereghost's allies gain 2 levels.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/422.

name: Marco Volo
text: At the start of the player's turn, he can look at the top card of any draw pile and discard it if he wants.

name: The Harpers
text: The Harpers can cast wizard and cleric spells, but the player must choose one type (wizard or cleric) in each battle when this card is used.

name: Gnomes of Samek
text: Gnome. Earthwalker. The gnomes' armor gives them the ability to ignore one ally, magical item, or offensive spell each round.

name: Adventurers!
text: Can use cleric and wizard spells.

name: War Party
text: If more than two of this card are involved in one round of combat (on either side), each war party receives an additional +4 for each war party in play. No limit per deck.

name: Crime Lord
text: The Crime Lord can also be played as an event to destroy one holding. The destroyed holding and the Crime Lord are discarded.

name: Adventurers
text: All allies of these adventurers gain 1 level.

name: The Jotunslayers
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. The Jotunslayers are level 8 if the opposing champion is a monster.

name: Armies of Bloodstone
text: This ally can "save" a champion - the player can withdraw his champion from combat and continue with a new one (allies and spells are discarded). The "rescued" champion cannot attack or defend until this player's next turn.

name: The Iron Legion
text: This ally instills fear in all opposing heroes, reducing their base level to 0 in battle.

name: Tergoz Tenhammer
text: Tergoz's mighty hammer has slayed ten men with one blow! Allies are so terrified they cannot be played against Tergoz.

name: Myrmidons
text: When the myrmidons are discarded, the player shuffles all discards back into the draw deck.

name: The Magister
text: Immune to psionicists. The magister and all attached items can be moved from the player's pool to his hand during his phase 5.

name: King Havlor II
text: The king has a permanent +5 magical item (flaming sword) attached to him that cannot be removed by any means.

name: Pteranadon
text: The Pteranadon gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

name: Gorgosaurus
text: The Gorgosaurus gains 3 levels when defending Chult.

name: Greater Feyr
text: The first enemy ally played against the feyr in each battle is discarded immediately.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/402.

name: Cleric of Torm
text: May be discarded at any time from a player's pool to eliminate any ally from play.

name: Cleric of Mask
text: This card and attached magical items and artifact are kept face down, and revealed only in battle.

name: Drow Matron
text: Elf (drow). The drow matron gains 3 levels when defending Menzoberranzan.

name: Dracolich
text: Can use wizard spells. Undead. Flyer.

name: Vasos Flameslayer
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Vasos gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Allisa of the Mist
text: Allisa gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Grypht the Saurial
text: Negates the levels and special powers of all offensive magical items of less than +4 enchantment.

name: Worden Ironfist
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Worden gains 3 levels when fighting monsters.

name: Amarill
text: If Amarill is defeated, the player can pull one other champion from his discards and return it to his hand.

name: Joliet the Rash
text: Once in play, Joliet must attack each turn, if possible, or be discarded. If victorious when attacking, Joliet gets a spoils of victory, even if a realm is not raised.

name: Dwarf of Earthfast
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Gains 4 levels if the opposing champion is a monster.

name: The Black Courser
text: The Black Courser's level is 8 when fighting dragons or undead.

name: Hornhead Saurial
text: The attached champion and all his allies are immune to magical items of +3 or less.

name: Dagrande
text: Dwarf. Earthwalker. Particularly proud of his ability to cleave through an opponent, Dagrande gets twice as many spoils of victory is victorious.

name: Mind Flayer
text: When played, the mind flayer can immediately shift one opposing ally to its own side for that round of battle. The ally loses 1 level.

name: Noble Djinni
text: The opponent cannot play flyers this round and all opposing flyers already in the battle are discarded.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/405.

name: Intellect Devourer
text: Immediately destroys an opposing champion of base level 5 or less.

name: Shandrill
text: Immune to offensive spells.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/423.

name: Cleric of Malar
text: This cleric gains 2 levels when attacking realms from outside the Forgotten Realms.

name: Airship
text: Destroys any two allies, chosen by this card's player; choice does not have to be immediate. (Harmful)

name: Bad Omens
text: All champions and allies, other than the event player's, lose 2 levels until the player's next turn. (Harmful)

name: Fortunate Omens
text: This player's allies gain 3 levels until his next turn. (Helpful)

name: Rod of Shapechange
text: Select any champion from the discard pile and use it in battle in place of this champion. After winning the battle, this champion and artifact return to the pool; the substitute is discarded.

name: Dwarven Hammer
text: The mighty hammer of the dwarves slays any giant opposing the attached champion. (Off)

name: Staff of Striking
text: The bonus becomes +5 levels if attached to a cleric. (Off)

name: Horrors of the Abyss
text: After the round of battle is concluded (win or lose), this spell and the opposing champion are sent to the Abyss. (Off/4/5)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/408.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
text: The bearer is immune to psionic attacks. If on the losing side of a battle, he can eliminate one magical item in play. (Off)

name: Cataclysm!
text: Destroys one realm of the player's choice; that realm is discarded. (Harmful)

name: Good Fortune
text: The player of this card draws five cards immediately.

name: Surprise Raid
text: This player's champion and allies are doubled in levels for one round of battle.

name: Banner of the One-Eyed God
text: All of this champion's allies gain 1 level. (Def)

name: Viperhand
text: Any champion with the Viperhand can cast wizard spells. (Def)

name: Orb of Doom
text: The attached champion can attack again this round if victorious. If he razes a realm, the champion and all attachments are discarded. (Def)

name: Staff of Conjuring
text: Can retrieve an ally from the discard pile during each battle the attached champion is in. If defeated, the staff is broken and sent to the Abyss. (Def)

name: Spell of Formless Horror
text: Cast on opposing champion to reduce its level by 3. Spell remains until dispelled. (Off/3/4/5)

name: Safe Harbor!
text: Every player can immediately rebuild one razed realm.

name: Labor of Legend
text: One razed realm is rebuilt by a champion from the player's pool; the champion is discarded.

name: Wand of Light
text: Any undead, werecreature, or vampire loses 2 levels against the wand. (Off)

name: Elf Galleon
text: Flyer. Swimmer. All allies played after the elf galleon in this battle are also flyers and swimmers.

name: The Free City of Greyhawk
text: Any champion defending Greyhawk can cast cleric and wizard spells.

name: The Lands of Iuz
text: Any champion defending the Lands of Iuz can cast wizard spells. All defenders gain 3 levels if anyone has Iuz in play.

name: The Pomarj
text: A monster defending the Pomarj gains 3 levels.

name: Hold of the Sea Princes
text: This realm can defend itself as a level 1 champion.

name: The Yeomanry
text: Earthwalkers gain 2 levels when defending the Yeomanry.

name: Blackmoor
text: All magical items and artifacts defending Blackmoor gain 2 levels.

name: The Horned Society
text: At the start of this player's turn, send one champion to Limbo until the end of that player's next turn.

name: The Wolf Nomads
text: The Wolf Nomads are immune to the power of Iuz the Evil. But they are fearful of dragons, and dragons gain 1 level when attacking this realm.

name: Sterich
text: Any monster defending Sterich gains 5 levels.

name: Nyrond
text: Elves, gnomes, and halflings gain 3 levels when defending Nyrond.

name: Veluna
text: Any champion defending Veluna can use cleric spells.

name: Furyondy
text: When first played, Furyondy can remove one wizard from play (the wizard is discarded).

name: The Great Kingdom
text: No undead can attack the Great Kingdom. The player's maximum hand increases by two.

name: Temple of Elemental Evil
text: Draw three cards immediately when the temple is played.

name: Greyhawk Ruins
text: All Greyhawk champions of this player gain 2 levels.

name: Perrenland
text: Maximum hand size for all opposing players is reduced by one.

name: Keoland
text: Can defend itself as a level 0 hero and use allies and magical items. If this hero successfully defends the realm, he can keep one ally or magical item.

name: Celene
text: Monsters cannot attack or defend Celene. Elves gain 2 levels when defending this realm.

name: The Bright Desert
text: Cannot be attacked by heroes.

name: Theocracy of the Pale
text: Clerics refuse to attack the Theocracy; clerics who defend the realm, however, double their base level.

name: The Bone March
text: Heroes cannot be played in defense of this realm. Undead defenders gain 4 levels.

name: The Duchy of Urnst
text: The naval fleet of the duchy is so powerful that the realm is immune to swimmers.

name: The Sea Barons
text: Any holding attached to the Great Kingdom also applies to this realm.

name: Hookhill
text: This player's Greyhawk realms are immune to offensive spells and harmful events if Bissel is also in play anywhere.

name: The Scarlet Brotherhood
text: Player can eliminate one champion from any pool at the start of his turn. This realm is then razed.

name: Iron Hills
text: This player's Geryhawk champions are immune to offensive spells and harmful events if Irongate is also in play anywhere.

name: Principality of Ulek
text: This realm has coastal fortifications and is immune to all swimmers.

name: County of Sunndi
text: Any champion can use wizard spells when defending the County of Sunndi; spells are doubled in level.

name: Duchy of Tenh
text: If Menzoberranzan is played or razed while this realm is in play, this player draws 3 cards.

name: Burneal Forest
text: Any champion and allies who attack Burneal Forest lose 2 levels.

name: Castle Hart
text: Any champion and allies defending Castle Hart gain 2 levels.

name: Ancient Arms of the Horned Society
text: This player's Greyhawk monsters all have the ability to earthwalk, as do their allies.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/438.

name: Ancient Arms of Greyhawk
text: If Iuz the Evil is in play, this player's undead are doubled in base level.

name: Ancient Arms of the Great Kingdom
text: All undead allies of this player are tripled in level, when attacking or defending.

name: Ancient Arms of Furyondy
text: The attached realm deflects all offensive spells and harmful events directed at it to any other realm of the player's choice.

name: Ancient Arms of Nyrond
text: This player's monsters have the ability to fly, swim, or earthwalk as needed.

name: Skull Keep
text: Any champion defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

name: Fortification
text: The attached realm and all its defenders are immune to offensive wizard and cleric spells.

name: Siege!
text: Razes the first realm of every player, regardless of special powers; if a player's first realm is already razed, he ignores this event. (Harmful)

name: War Banner
text: Every champion and ally of this player gains 1 level. (Def)

name: Codex of the Infinite Planes
text: All of this player's champions are immune to offensive magical items and spells. (Def)

name: Crystal of the Ebon Flame
text: The champion who holds this crystal must attack on his turn or be discarded. (Off)

name: Hordes of Castle Greyhawk
text: If used in the victorious defense of a Greyhawk realm, these allies remain with the realm until it is razed.

name: Lich Conclave
text: Undead. Can cast wizard and cleric spells. All allies played with it become undead.

name: Eye and Hand of Vecna
text: The attached champion gains 5 levels when attacking, 2 when defending.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
text: This player's Greyhawk realms cannot be attacked by dragons or monsters.

name: Baba Yaga's Hut
text: All of this player's allies are considered flyers.

name: Chariot of Lyrx
text: The attached champion gains 3 levels and becomes a flyer; all allies can also fly.

name: Cup of Al'Akbar
text: If the player discards three cards from his hand at the end of his turn, he can return any one card from the discard pile to his hand.

name: Rary the Traitor
text: Rary gains 3 levels when fighting a wizard and/or 3 levels when defending a realm with an attached holding.

name: Mordenkainen
text: Any magical item attached to Mordenkainen cannot be removed by any means.

name: Tysiln San
text: Elf (drow). This champion hates Dragonlance heroes and automatically wins any battle against them.

name: Otto
text: Otto can cast both wizard and cleric spells.

name: Mika the Wolf-Nomad
text: Mika gains 3 levels when the opponent uses allies against him.

name: Lolth, the Spider Queen
text: Lolth can cast both wizard and cleric spells. If Lolth is defeated, shuffle her back into the draw deck.

name: Iuz the Evil
text: Iuz can cast wizard spells. If defeated, Iuz forces one razed enemy realm to be discarded, or razes one realm.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/407.

name: Avatar's Bane
text: Undead. If on the losing side of a battle, this ally destroys one avatar in play anywhere, chosen by this player.

name: Sysania
text: Flyer. Sysania confers the ability to fly on all allies played with her.

name: Kiara
text: Elf. Kiara can destroy one magical item being used against her. The affected item is discarded.

name: Hettman Tsurin
text: If Hettman does not attack, at the end of his turn the player can randomly draw one card from another player's hand and discard it.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/424.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/425.

name: Mist Wolf
text: No allies can be played until this player's next turn. Allies in play are discarded immediately. (Harmful)

name: Tyrinon
text: Tyrinon's allies all become flyers. They are strengthened by his presence, and each gains 2 levels.

name: Quagmiela the Dragon
text: Alone of monsters, Quagmiela can stand against the Lovely Colleen (perhaps because he attacks from behind); combat is resolved normally.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/410.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/439.

name: Berserk Wrath!
text: Only this player's heroes gain 5 levels until the end of his next turn.

name: Wolf Nomads
text: The nomads gain 2 levels if Mika is in the player's pool.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/406.

name: Miles
text: If played against a champion who has 4 or more attached cards, Miles strips the champion of all but one card (chosen by the opposing player).

name: Trystan
text: This ally negates the special power of one ally (chosen by this player).

name: Thorvid
text: Thorvid gains 3 levels when fighting monsters, undead, or flyers.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/426.

name: Nenioc
text: Nenioc may be sacrificed to bring out an avatar, but she is shuffled back into the player's draw pile rather than discarded.

name: Young Gold Dragon
text: Flyer. The Dragon can use wizard spells.

name: Arch-Druid
text: All other clerics must ask the arch-druid for permission to cast spells. While the arch-druid is in play, no avatars may be played.

name: Hell Hound
text: All cards friendly to the hell hound are immune to offensive spells.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/412.

name: Skeleton Commander
text: Undead. Level rises to 6 if played from 6 pm to 6 am. Any magical item weapons held by the opposing champion are discarded and no more can be played.

name: Skeleton
text: Undead. The skeleton multiplies: It gains 4 levels for each additional undead ally played with it.

name: Winged Horror
text: Undead. Flyer. Any magical item weapons attached to the horror are doubled in level.

name: Treants of the Grandwood
text: The treants and all cards in the player's force are immune to all offensive wizard spells except fireball.

name: Rangers of the Hornwood
text: This ranger automatically defeats all Forgotten Realms heroes.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/411.

name: Border Forts
text: Only flyers can attack the attached realm.

name: Ren's Crystal Ball
text: At the beginning of his turn, the owner of Ren's Crystal Ball can inspect the top three cards of any deck and discard one.

name: Falcon Figurine
text: Confers the ability to teleport; the attached champion and all allies can attack any realm, regardless of powers. (Def)

name: Transformation!
text: All players must discard their hands immediately and draw five cards. (Harmful)

name: Slave Revolt!
text: All opposing players must discard one champion from their pool (chosen by this player). (Harmful)

name: Bruce's Revenge
text: This player can swap two of his opponents' realms with each other in their formations; any attached holdings are discarded. (Harmful)

name: Bribery!
text: Play immediately after champions are selected. The bribed champion returns to the owner's pool and that player must select another champion or lose the battle. (Harmful)

name: Charge!
text: All of this player's champions gain 3 levels until the end of the player's next turn.

name: Kevin's Blade of Doom
text: If the combat level of the attached hero or monster is greater than 20 (after all modifiers), the champion automatically wins the battle. (Off)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/427.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/428.

name: Ancient Arms of Veluna
text: All allies played in the successful defense of any Greyhawk realm held by this player are resurrected (returned to his hand) instead of discarded.

name: Fast Talking!
text: Everyone is convinced all artifacts and magical items in play no longer work. All players discard all magical items and artifacts. (Harmful)

name: Flight
text: This player's champions and allies put forward in battle become flyers for this turn. (Def/3/4)

name: Shapechange
text: The caster can choose to become a different champion type (cleric, wizard, hero, monster or psionicist) for this round of battle.

name: The Barbarian's Revenge!
text: All players who have four or more unrazed realms in play must discard a realm from their formation or two realms from their hand. This event is immune to Limited Wish. (Harmful)

name: Storm at Sea
text: All players draw three cards face up. Any realms drawn must be discarded immediately. All other cards are kept in the hand. (Harmful)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/429.

name: Ancient Arms of the Shield Lands
text: Attach this holding to a razed Greyhawk realm to rebuild it instantly, causing one other Greyhawk realm in play to be razed (chosen by this player). Limit one per deck.

name: Net of Entrapment
text: This champion's opponent cannot play allies. (Off)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/413.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/415.

name: Rod of Dispel Magic
text: A champion with this rod can cancel one magic spell when attacking or defending.

name: Draj
text: Nonflying attackers lose 2 levels.

name: Raam
text: All defenders of this realm gain 1 level.

name: Urik
text: Allies cannot be played to attack Urik. Urik can defend itself as a level 4 champion.

name: Tyr
text: Owner draws one extra card per turn. Tyr can defend itself as a level 5 hero.

name: Gulg
text: The first ally to attack Gulg itself each battle is destroyed. Gulg can defend itself as a level 7 hero.

name: Nibenay
text: This card is not flipped face down unless Nibenay is razed twice in a row.

name: Balic
text: All attacking allies are halved (round up). Balic can defend itself as a level 4 hero.

name: The Mud Palace
text: The Mud Palace increases hand size by two cards.

name: North Ledopolus
text: One card can be drawn and played immediately in defense of the attached realm.

name: South Ledopolus
text: The attached realm can use any ally as a champion. The ally is still discarded after the battle.

name: Altaruk
text: Any champion defending the attached realm can cast cleric spells.

name: Mekillot
text: Avatars cannot attack any realm held by this player.

name: Ogo
text: All champions and allies who attack the attached realm lose 3 levels - any reduced to 0 are discarded immediately.

name: Makla
text: Makla adds 1 level to all defenders of the attached realm.

name: Kalidnay
text: Any monster defending the attached realm gains 4 levels.

name: Arkhold
text: Allows owner to draw one extra card per turn.

name: Salt View
text: Defending champion gains 2 levels.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/404.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/440.

name: Giustenal
text: A champion attacking the attached realm cannot play more than three allies per round.

name: Yaramuke
text: Poisoned water destroys one of the attacker's allies as it is played (defender's choice).

name: Lost Oasis
text: The owner can draw one card and play it immediately when the attached realm is attacked.

name: Grak's Pool
text: The oasis acts as a permanent +5 ally to any champion who defends the attached realm.

name: Silver Spring
text: If the attached realm is razed, one other opponent's realm of the defender's choice is razed also.

name: Bitter Well
text: This oasis destroys any flyers that attack the attached realm.

name: Black Waters
text: No werecreature or monster can attack any realm held by this player.

name: Fort Melidor
text: Allies defending any Dark Sun realm held by this player are doubled in level.

name: Dungeon of Gulg
text: All champions (if defeated) and allies who attack this realm are sent to the Abyss at the end of battle.

name: Ziggurat
text: The level bonus (number in icon) of any wizard spell cast in defense of the attached realm is doubled.

name: Temple
text: The attached realm can cast cleric spells.

name: Mogadisho's Horde
text: If this card is on the losing side of a battle, all holdings of the opponent are discarded.

name: Assassins
text: If this card is on the losing side of the battle, it destroys one champion anywhere in play chosen by the losing player.

name: Halfling Mercenaries
text: Strip any existing artifact and magical items from an opponent; do not affect any played after the mercenaries are in play.

name: War Band
text: +8 vs. undead.

name: Kank Lancers
text: All opposing swimmers (champions and allies) are discarded immediately; no more can be played against it.

name: Nomad Mercenaries
text: Can be played any time to participate in another player's battle; level rises to 6. Regardless of the outcome, the mercenaries return to this player, who receives no spoils. Limit 3 per deck.

name: Gladiators
text: If played with a Dark Sun champion, the gladiators remain with that champion until he is defeated or discarded.

name: Rikus
text: Rikus can attack twice; if he wins his first round, he can attack again with new allies.

name: Neeva
text: Flyer. When defending a Dark Sun realm, her level is doubled.

name: Sadira
text: Sadira can use any psionic power. Psionicists must ask her permission to use psionic powers, though they can still use their stated special abilities.

name: Agis
text: When attacking, can psionically destroy one monster in the defender's pool before battle begins.

name: Erellika
text: Can cast wizard and cleric spells. When defending, negates all psionic powers for that battle. When attacking, negates the powers of all enemy holdings for the duration of that battle.

name: Vaerhirmana
text: Vaerhirmana can negate one psionic power per turn, regardless of whether in pool or combat.

name: Herminard
text: Herminard has a death wish, and if he dies when defending a Dark Sun realm, the opposing champion (though victorious) must be discarded too.

name: T'kkyl
text: Although allies may be played against T'kkyl, if successful the thri-kreen eats them. (They are sent to the Abyss and not the discard pile.)

name: Azhul the Hasty
text: Azhul may attack with new allies as many times as he wants every turn until he razes a realm or is defeated.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/416.

name: Bagual
text: Once during each combat round, Bagual can retrieve and cast a cleric spell from this player's draw pile. Reshuffle the pile after each turn.

name: Rowan
text: Elf. Rowan can send one opposing ally or magical item to the Abyss.

name: Shayira
text: Negates the special powers (but not the bonuses) of all cards played against her.

name: Ashathra
text: Can be discarded at any time to discard one opposing ally.

name: Stug
text: If on the losing side of a battle, Stug can rob a victorious player of his spoils of victory by allowing a player not invloved in the battle to draw spoils instead.

name: Ka'Cha
text: Negates the power of all +1 or +2 allies played against him.

name: Galek
text: Can draw a card from the opposing player's draw pile, playing it on this player's side if applicable, otherwise discarding it.

name: Wind Dancers
text: All flyers in play are destroyed immediately. (Harmful)

name: Water Hunters
text: All undead in play are destroyed immediately. (Harmful)

name: Silver Hands' Revenge
text: This player's champions killed in the last battle are restored to his pool. Play only after a battle is completely resolved. (Helpful)

name: Sky Singers
text: Destroys all magical items in play. (Harmful)

name: Silt Stalkers
text: If on the losing side of a battle, all magical items in play are shuffled back into the draw pile.

name: Night Runners
text: Elves. If on the winning side of a battle, this player can choose one magical item, artifact, or rule card in play anywhere to be discarded.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/430.

name: Cistern Fiend
text: Immune to offensive and defensive spells. Enemy allies cannot be used against this fiend.

name: Sloth
text: When played in battle, the opposing player must immediately discard one card from his hand.

name: Mul Savage
text: Immune to offensive and defensive magical items.

name: Inhuman
text: Attached champion and allies are immune to ally powers for this round of combat.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/431.

name: Cha'thrang
text: All nonflying allies opposing the Cha'thrnag lose 4 levels.

name: Spirit of the land
text: Prevents one Dark Sun realm or holding from being razed or discarded, or restores one razed realm from any world. An attacker gets no spoils of victory and the battle is over. (Helpful)

name: Thri-kreen
text: All nonhuman allies (elves, dwarves, and halflings) lose 2 levels for fear of the thri-kreen.

name: Wijon
text: Wijon can double the level of one ally played after him (choice need not be immediate).

name: Mikor
text: If on the losing side of a battle, Mikor transfers all non-event cards in this player's Abyss to his discard pile.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/432.

name: Zurn
text: Zurn can ally himself with any victorious champion, returning with that champion to the pool.

name: Powell
text: Powell can be discarded to the Abyss during phase 3 to retrieve a magical item.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/433.

name: Wachter
text: Wachter's bonus increases to +8 if played from 6 am to 6 pm.

name: Foucault
text: Elf. Foucault and all other attached cards are immune to all spells and magical items with the words "fire" or "flame" in their title.

name: Stef'fa Naf'ski
text: Psionically negates the special power of an opposing champion in battle. If defeated, he negates the special power of a champion in any pool until Dispel Magic is cast on the affected champion.

name: Captain Kazhal
text: Destroys one magical item held by the opposing champion at any time during the battle round.

name: Dlasva
text: Dlasva can psionically destroy one opposing ally during a round of battle.

name: Tithian
text: If Tithian attacks and wins a round of battle, the defending realm is razed immediately.

name: Verrasi
text: No magical items with a bonus greater than +3 can be played after Verrasi joins the battle.

name: Rogue Defiler of Tyr
text: Each time the defiler casts a spell during combat, her player discards one card from his hand and draws a replacement from his draw pile.

name: The Lion of Urik
text: Can cast wizard spells and use psionic powers. Immune to psionic attack.

name: Borys the Dragon
text: Flyer. Can cast wizard and cleric spells and use psionic powers. Immune to psionic attack.

name: Preserver
text: If defeated by a Dark Sun champion, the preserver is sent to Limbo until his end of this player's next turn, when he returns to his pool.

name: Punisher
text: If on the losing side of a battle, the punisher returns to the player's hand instead of being discarded.

name: Gith
text: If two gith are played in the same round of combat, each increases to a +7.

name: Tiger
text: If played during defense, the shape-changed druid remains with the realm until it is razed.

name: Orb of Power
text: Offensive spells and magical items have no affect against the champion with this orb. (Def)

name: Ring of All Seeing
text: Allows the owning player, at the beginning of his turn, to look at one player's hand. (Def)

name: Treasure
text: All monsters are bribed to desert; discard all monsters in battle or in pools. (Harmful)

name: Shield of Destruction
text: Absorbs the effects of one offensive spell played against the attached champion (this player's choice) once per turn. (Def)

name: Shield of Annihilation
text: Instantly annihilates one opposing enemy ally played against the attached champion (this player's choice). (off)

name: Shield of Devastation
text: Negates the power of one offensive magical item used against the attached champion (this player's choice), once per turn. (Off)

name: Shield of Wickedness
text: One enemy ally, chosen by the shield's owner, is forced to switch sides and fight for the shield's owner for one round of battle. (Off)

name: Shield of Gore
text: Allies of less than +4 cannot be played against the attached champion, and allies of +1 or +2 currently in battle are discarded. (Off)

name: The Heartwood Spear
text: Kills any opposing dragon or monster in the battle automatically.

name: The Caravan
text: Play only between two player's turns. The player of this event can take a turn immediately. Afterward, play continues where it left off. (Helpful)

name: The Necklace
text: Allows the attached champion to cast wizard spells and confers immunity to psionic powers. (Def)

name: Elemental Cleric
text: The elemental cleric is immune to offensive wizard spells.

name: Elven Archer
text: The elven archer's skill with the bow is such that it can kill, instantly, one enemy ally of its choice.

name: The Outcast
text: Can use cleric or wizard spells.

name: Thugs
text: Can be attached to any realm during phase 3 as a permanent ally.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/434.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/417.

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/435.

name: Marauder
text: Can be discarded at any time to negate an event created by using the Bell of Might.

name: Shaqat Beetles
text: If defeated in combat, these parasites attach themselves to the victorious champion, reducing his level to 1.

name: Tembo
text: The opponent cannot use allies for defense or offense.

name: Fireball
text: Destroys immediately all opposing allies of level 4 or less. (Off/4)

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Immediately destroys one opposing ally of level 4 or less, or one magical item, of caster's choice. (Off/4)

name: Paralyze
text: Cast on a champion before battle to prevent that card from defending. Cast during a battle to eliminate one ally of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

name: Magic Missile
text: (Off/4)

name: Wall of Fire
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Off/4)

name: Wall of Iron
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Stone
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. Use on defense only. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Force
text: Only flyers can attack across the wall. (Def/4)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/418.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Destroys one artifact, chosen by the caster. (Off/4)

name: Sleep
text: Eliminates up to three opposing allies of level 1 or 2, chosen by the caster. Can be cast during any battle, including those between opponents. (Off)

name: Shield
text: Negates the Magic Missile spell. (Def/4)

name: Fly
text: One champion and/or ally becomes a flyer. (Def/3/4)

name: Crushing Fist
text: The crushing fist adds 4 levels or destroys one magical item, at the choice of the caster. (Off/4)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/420.

name: Dispel Magic
text: Can be cast at any time to cancel the effects of a just-cast spell or to cancel an existing spell. (Def)

name: Improved Phantasmal Force
text: If cast by an undead champion, he can bypass a defending wizard or cleric and raze the realm. The defending champion returns to his pool. (Def/4)

name: Fear
text: Attach to any enemy champion in a pool; that card cannot attack or defend until the fear is dispelled. (Off/3)

name: Cure Light Wounds
text: Can be cast to retrieve an ally of level 1 or 2 who was discarded during this battle. (Def/4/5)

name: Cure Serious Wounds
text: Can be cast to retrieve an ally of level 3 or 4 who was discarded buring this combat. (Def/4/5)

name: Sticks to Snakes
text: Increases to +6 if cast by a level 7 or 8 champion, and increases to +8 if cast by a level 9 or higher champion. (Off/4)

name: Blade Barrier
text: Destroys all opposing allies of level 5 or less. Cast only when defending. (Off/4)

name: Bless
text: The champion and each of its allies gain 1 level this round. (Def/4)

name: Sanctuary
text: The cleric who casts sanctuary loses this round of battle but is not discarded; it returns to the pool instead. (Def/4)

name: Wind Walk
text: The champion and all his allies this round are treated as flyers. (Def/3/4)

name: Bark Skin
text: Adds 2 levels to a single defender. (Def/4)

name: Charm
text: Opponent loses one ally of the caster's choice, chosen immediately. (Off/4)

name: Dispel Magic
text: Can be cast at any time to cancel the effects of a just-cast spell or to cancel an existing spell. (Def)

name: Darkness
text: This battle ends immediately with no victor or loser; champions return to their pools, allies to the players' hands, spells are discarded. Darkness has no effect against monsters. (Def/4)

name: Protection
text: The opponent cannot use undead in this battle round; any already played as allies are discarded. An undead champion loses the battle but returns to the pool. (Def/4)

name: Chariot of Sustarre
text: One champion or two allies can fly for one round of battle. (Def/3/4)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/436.

name: Wall of Thorns
text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 3 or higher can cross the wall. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Fire
text: Cast only when defending. Only attackers of level 4 or higher can cross the wall. (Off/4)

name: Holy Word
text: Destroys all undead allies on both sides of a battle instantly. (Off/4)

name: Raise Dead
text: Any one defeated champion can be selected from the player's discard pile and placed back in his hand. (Def/3/5)

name: Flame Strike
text: Destroys any number of opposing allies with levels totaling 6 or less, selected by the caster. Discard immediately. (Off/4)

name: Protection from Lightning
text: Lightning cannot harm the caster or his allies in this battle. (Def/4)

name: Silence
text: The opposing champion cannot cast any spells in this battle. (Off/4)

name: Improved Invisibility to Undead
text: If on the losing side of a battle with an undead, this champion can slip by and return to his pool. He is not defeated, and may defend or attack again this battle. (Def/4)

name: Wall of Fog
text: No attacks are allowed against any player until the caster's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Forget
text: One ally 'forgets' to attack or defend this turn; discard the ally. (Off/4)

name: Web
text: Destroys any opposing allies of level 3 or less already in play. (Off/4)

name: Blink
text: A champion who is about to lose a round of battle escapes to the player's pool, but the battle is still lost. (Def/4)

name: Hold Undead
text: Opposing undead allies have no effect on the outcome of this battle. (Off/4)

name: Charm Monster
text: An opposing monster returns to its pool; the caster wins this round of battle. (Off/4)

name: Wind of Disenchantment
text: An antimagic storm sweeps across the cosmos, destroying all magical items in play. (Harmful)

name: Black Tentacles
text: All champions of base level 4 or less die, regardless of whether they are in battle or in pools. (Off/3/4)

name: Fire Shield
text: The caster and his allies are immune to all spells with the words "fire" or "flame" in the name. (Def/3/4)

name: Ice Storm
text: Destroys all champions and allies of level 4 or less in play anywhere. (Harmful)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/419.

name: Solid Fog
text: Unearthly fog prevents all attacks against all players until this player's next turn. (Harmful)

name: Animate Dead
text: A wizard who casts this spell can fight again in the next round of battle, regardless of whether he won or lost the previous round. (Def/4)

name: Cloudkill
text: Opposing allies of level 3 or less are discarded and no more can be played this round. (Off/4)

name: Feebleminded
text: An opposing spellcaster cannot cast any spells for the rest of this round. (Off/4)

name: Magic Jar
text: If the defender is defeated, the current attacking champion becomes the defending champion in the next round of this battle and then is discarded. (Off/4)

name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound
text: After an opponent puts forward a champion in attack, this player's hound sounds a warning. The defender can put his champion on the battlefield first (thus activation his special powers first). (Helpful)

name: Passwall
text: Negates any wall spell. (Def/4)

name: Rock to Mud
text: Only flyers can attack this player's realms until the player's next turn. (Def/4)

name: Chain Lightning
text: This spell's bonus increases to +7 if cast by a champion of level 7 or higher. (Off/4)

name: Death Fog
text: Kills all champions of level 5 or less in one player's pool and prevents survivors from attacking until after that player's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Death Spell
text: Kills any one champion or ally of the caster's choosing of level 7 or less. (Off/3/4)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 1st/437.

name: Geas
text: The affected champion can neither attack nor defend until after the owner's next turn. (Off/3)

name: Banishment
text: Destroys one monster of the caster's choice. (Off/3/4)

name: Control Undead
text: The caster can ask any player for his largest undead ally card and use it in this round of battle. The ally is discarded afterward. (Off/4)

name: Finger of Death
text: Kills any one champion or ally of level 5 or less. (Off/4)

name: Spell Turning
text: Can be cast at any time to turn a just-cast spell back at its caster, as if the original target had cast it. (Def)

name: (no card)
text: Replaced by 2nd/409.

name: Calm
text: This magical calm undoes the harmful effect of an event, but only for the player of this card. (Helpful)
